title: Inflation & Tories Go To Northern Ireland
itunes:title: Inflation & Tories Go To Northern Ireland
description:
UK inflation hits double digits in July, a new 40-year high. Bloomberg's EMEA Economics and Government correspondent Lizzy Burden and Opinion columnist Marcus Ashworth delve into the economic and political implications. And as the Tory leadership candidates take their campaign to Belfast, Northern Ireland Assembly opposition leader, Matthew O'Toole of the SDLP, tells Bloomberg's Stephen Carroll how he thinks the next PM will affect Northern Ireland.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
